data.event: Sini is also blessed to have a very old cricket ground, popular as "Shershah Ground", where many inter division level competitions are held on a regular basis.The only institute for computer education is NSCS which stands for Narayan Softtech Computer Solutions which is located at Karim Bagan, Sini and it was established in the year 2008.There is a famous school named S.E.RLY.INTER.COLLEGE up-to class 12th.This year(2013) in the matric examination 6 students of this school got more than 80percentile marks from JAC board and two of the students got rank in the district top 10.
